sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import {Products} from '../../data'; import './SingleItem.css'; const SingleItem = (props) => { //檢查id是否與路徑pid相同 console.log(props) const productId = props.match.params.pid; const checkItem = Products.filter(item => item.id === +productId); console.log(checkItem); return (
check
{checkItem[0].productName}
CAD {checkItem[0].price}

{checkItem[0].description}

SIZE:
{/* size chart for modal */}
Material

{checkItem[0].material["farbicDetail"]}

Washing Instructions

{checkItem[0].material["washingInstruction"]}

{checkItem[0].material["warning"]}

) } export default SingleItem;
